definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: tablet, board or plank, plate (NH id., Aram. [[לוּחָא]], luwh.o0; Ar. lawh.un; (mod. pron. lûḥ, lôḥ, cf. e.g. Spiro:Arab.-Eng. Vocab. Buhl), Eth. lawh.:, but As.  li‘û (as if from [[לחה]]) in Dl:HWB 366; see, however,  lêjum (lêyum) Jäger:BAS i, 486);—´[[ל]] abs. Is 30:8; cstr. Pr 3:3 + 4 t.; du. [[לֻחׂתָָיִם]] Ez Eze 27:5; pl. [[לוחׂת]] ([[לֻחוֹת]],[[לֻחׂת ]]) abs. Ex 32:16 + 17 t.; cstr. De 4:13 + 16 t.;—

chiefly of stone tablets on which ten words were written Ex 24:12, Ex 31:18, Ex 32:16, Ex 32:16, Ex 32:19 (all E), Ex 34:1, Ex 34:1, Ex 34:1, Ex 34:4, Ex 34:4, Ex 34:28 (all J), De 4:13, De 5:19, De 9:9, De 9:10, De 9:11, De 9:17, De 10:1, De 10:2, De 10:2, De 10:3, De 10:3, De 10:4, De 10:5, 1Ki 8:9, 2Ch 5:10; [[הָעֵדֻת]] ´[[ל]] Ex 31:18, Ex 32:15 cf. v:Ex 32:15, Ex 34:29 (all P); [[הַבְּרִית]] ´[[ל]] De 9:9, De 9:11, De 9:15; tablet for writing prophecy Is 30:8 (‖[[סֵפֶר ]]), Hb Hab 2:2, and fig., [[לוּחַ לִבְּךָ]] Pr 3:3, Pr 7:3 (for writing wise counsel), cf. Je 17:1 (inscribing sin of Judah); (vb. mostly [[כָּחַב]] Ex 31:18; Ex 32:15, De 9:10; [[עַל]] ´[[כ]] Ex 34:1, Ex 34:28, De 4:13, De 5:19, De 10:2, De 10:4, Pr 3:3, Pr 7:3, Is 30:8; [[חָרַשׁ עַל]] Je 17:1; [[כָּרַךְ]] sq. acc. De 9:9 cf. 1Ki 8:9 = 2Ch 5:10; [[חָרַת עַל]] Ex 32:16; [[בֵּאֵר עַל]] Hb Hab 2:2).
wooden boards, composing altar of tabern. Ex 27:8, Ex 38:7;  planks  composing ship (fig. of Tyre) Ez Eze 27:5; cf, [[נָחוּר עָלָיהָ לוּחַ אָָרֶז]] Ct So 8:9, of door.
(metal) plates on bases of lavers in Solomon"s temple 1Ki 7:36.
